Putin and Xi reject US 'interference', praise their own ties and trade - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:18:06 GMT X2NVIGZQYVNETKDM3K773G7RVU https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-xi-reject-us-interference-praise-their-own-ties-trade-kremlin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
EU drafts guidelines as it urges Big Tech to protect democratic electionsThe European Union's executive has started to compile guidelines for Big Tech platforms to prevent disinformation, hate speech and counterfeits from disrupting the process of democratic elections. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:12:48 GMT EJRLBIVY55KPVCUL3HVTAOMA3M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-drafts-guidelines-it-urges-big-tech-protect-democratic-elections-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
West African bloc says Burkina, Niger and Mali not following exit rulesThe West African regional bloc ECOWAS said on Thursday that military-ruled Niger, Mali and Burkina Faso had failed to abide by the rules for quitting the bloc as regional ministers met to discuss departures that threaten decades of integration. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:57:07 GMT 7GEERFF2G5KH5BXISSIGXB3SAI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/west-african-bloc-says-burkina-niger-mali-not-following-exit-rules-2024-02-08/Reuters世界非洲
U.N. urges Russia to end forcible transfer of Ukrainian childrenThe U.N. Committee on the Rights of the Child on Thursday urged Russia to end the forcible transfer of children from occupied areas of Ukraine in violation of international law, and return them to their families. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:36:16 GMT V65WCLUDW5MP3P3KHQR335CAL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-urges-Russia-end-forcible-transfer-ukrainian-children-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
UK PM Sunak declines to apologise over transgender jibeBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak declined on Thursday to apologise for a gender identity jibe at opposition leader Keir Starmer, which drew criticism in the light of the widely reported recent murder of a transgender girl. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:25:46 GMT GX5RS27QRJOR7MUOI6VWR2ISB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-pm-sunak-declines-apologise-over-transgender-jibe-2024-02-08/Reuters世界英国
Scholz, Biden to discuss Ukraine aid, NATO and Israel warGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz said his talks with U.S. President Joe Biden in Washington on Friday will focus on how to strengthen support for Ukraine to help it battle Russia's invasion. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:20:37 GMT WZP77ZBZW5KLPIDSHQ45KOHF2A https://www.reuters.com/world/scholz-biden-discuss-ukraine-aid-nato-israel-war-2024-02-08/Andreas Rinke, Sarah Marsh世界
Hungary is treating Italian detainee better, minister Tajani saysAn Italian woman who is being held in a Budapest prison is getting better treatment after a protest last week to the Hungarian authorities, Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani told parliament on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:14:15 GMT MOVAD3VEX5KQPNX75YTHBFZCEA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-is-treating-italian-detainee-better-minister-tajani-says-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Second Irish poll shows sharp drop in Sinn Fein supportSupport in Ireland for Sinn Fein fell six percentage points to 28% in an opinion poll on Thursday, the second survey in the last two weeks to show a narrowing of its still wide lead ahead of an election due early next year. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:12:29 GMT M4ZO5OVUWVKRJBVN42WKY2PY7I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/second-irish-poll-shows-sharp-drop-sinn-fein-support-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Finland extends Russia border closing until April 14The Finnish government will extend the closure of crossing stations on its border with Russia until April 14, the Interior Ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:05:04 GMT ITNCGONGPBIJVO36Y5KYIAWP54 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-extends-Russia-border-looking-until-april-14-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil police target Bolsonaro allies in probe of coup attemptBrazil's federal police on Thursday launched an operation targeting some of former President Jair Bolsonaro's top aides, sources involved in the operation told Reuters, in an investigation into an attempted coup after his election defeat. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:42:35 GMT QU56FH3JRJPCJBX4C6BSYM3QNM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-police-target-bolsonaro-allies-probe-into-coup-attempt-2024-02-08/Lisandra Paraguassu, Ricardo Brito世界美洲
China's Xi urges 'close strategic coordination' in call with PutinChina's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the two countries should pursue close strategic coordination and defend the sovereignty, security and development interests of their respective countries, state media said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:35:35 GMT VXXJKPILGZNANHLPEK53EJTDCI https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-urges-close-strategic-coordination-call-with-putin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
